synopsis.text:
Sea-kissed landscapes, a vintage camera, and the magic of photography come together in this heartwarming tale of Fuu Sawatari, a young girl who moves to the charming town of Takehara by the Seto Inland Sea. Fuu's love for photography is inherited from her late father, who once roamed the same picturesque streets of Takehara, capturing its beauty through the lens of his beloved Rollei 35S camera.

As Fuu embarks on her high school journey, she finds herself surrounded by new friends who share her passion for capturing life's precious moments. Together, they explore the enchanting town and its surroundings, immortalizing their shared experiences and the mysterious Tamayura light bubbles through the power of photography.

While Fuu's camera shutter clicks away, she reminisces about her father and ponders her future. As she continues to discover the wonders of her new home, Fuu and her friends strive to transform the ordinary into the extraordinary, one photograph at a time. Through the lens of her camera, Fuu seeks to spread joy and happiness to those who need it, all while honoring the legacy of her late father.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
